name: MLB USER-TYPE; USER PRIVILEGES
description:
This section displays regression steps for a MLB user-type; user privileges.

Testing can be completed using the following account.
U: ctmlbuser@mlb.com
P: Baseball1

name: MLB USER-TYPE; ADMIN PRIVILEGES
description:
This section displays regression steps for a MLB user-type; admin privileges.

Testing can be completed using the following account.
U: ctmlbadmin@mlb.com
P: Baseball1

name: Admin Site - Users
description: Users should ONLY display "MLB" user-type data.

name: Admin Site - Console Tab
description: Console should ONLY display "MLB" user-type data.

name: Admin Site - Reports Tab
description:
Reports should ONLY display "MLB" user-type data.
-Test reporting with various filters (where applicable).
-Test exports with various filters (where applicable) and ensure MLB data can be exported.

name: MLB USER-TYPE; SUPER ADMIN PRIVILEGES
description:
This section displays regression steps for a MLB user-type; super admin privileges.

Testing can be completed using the following account.
U: ctmlbsu@mlb.com
P: Baseball1

name: Admin Site - Users
description: Users should display BOTH MLB and BOC users.

name: Admin Site - Console Tab
description: Console should ONLY display MLB user-type data.

name: Admin Site - Reports Tab
description:
Reports should display BOTH MLB and BOC user-type data.
-Test reporting with various filters (where applicable).
-Test exports with various filters (where applicable) and ensure combined MLB/BOC and separate MLB/BOC data can be exported.
